patch 8.1.0789: sourcing a session sets v:errmsg

Problem:    Sourcing a session sets v:errmsg.
Solution:   Use "%argdel" instead of "argdel *". (Jason Franklin)

patch 8.1.0789: sourcing a session sets v:errmsg

Problem:    Sourcing a session sets v:errmsg.
Solution:   Use "%argdel" instead of "argdel *". (Jason Franklin)
